Home.AboutMe: Hello, I'm a Animator with a focus on bringing characters to Life. I've been working in the industry about 5 years, worked in many companies as MPC Film as a Character Animator in VFX, Vetor Zero with commercials, CasaBlanca with TV Novel, PixelZoo with Series, Reel FX with Feature Films and currently I'm with Agora Studio working on Cinematics. I had the luck to be part of many cool projects. Hope you enjoy it!

Reel.ReelDescription: Here's my Reel of some projects that I've worked on throughout my career!
Reel.SoundsOn: Sounds ON! (Use a Headphone to have a better experience)
